definition: curtain or screen/canopy or tent/headquarters of a general/act (of a play)

sentences.english: The curtain has parted, and the mystery is being dispelled.
sentences.chinese: 幃幕已經拉開，神祕感正在消失。

sentences.english: Some thick old hangings had been nailed up before the windows to deaden the sound of the shrieks.
sentences.chinese: 窗上釘着某種厚重的舊幃幕，遮掩那些叫喊。
